name: gitquest-game
description: GitQuest: The Chrono-Coder's Journey - An interactive game to learn Git

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=shared
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=backend && npm run format --workspace=frontend && npm run format --workspace=shared
